text:
@realDonaldTrump “So instead of celebrating the joys of summer today, we will be contemplating on our current circumstances with the coronavirus and the cost that it has drawn from our nation,”... “sending prayers for the deceased, and the families they’ve left behind.”
Bruce Springsteen
